PublicAPIs.name: USGS Water Quality Portal
PublicAPIs.description: Use this API to fetch structured water quality data in the US by state and parameter code.

PublicAPIs.name: EPA Facility Registry
PublicAPIs.description: Use this API to retrieve structured information about environmental facilities in the US.

PublicAPIs.name: CDC Environmental Tracking
PublicAPIs.description: Use this API to fetch health and environmental tracking data.
